venue.name: Healing Tree Yoga and Wellness Center

item.description: Yoga releases the body and mind from tension allowing you to regain balance and energy utilizing the fundamental postures of yoga. This class will focus on basic yoga breathing and stretching. It is open to everyone, whether you need to sit in a chair, remain standing or flow from sitting to standing. Come and let us assist you in taking the first step toward enhancing your health and longevity, and deepening your connection to body, mind, heart, and spirit. It is never too late to begin the lifelong practice of yoga!

group.name: The Light Within - Yoga, Reiki, Meditation - Dorchester MA

item.name: Gentle Yoga Class
